main event: A UFO sighting occurred on February 8, 1967, involving an oblong shaped object with red and white lights moving rapidly in the sky.
interesting points: The object made a sharp climb and headed west,The object's path was linear and its flight path was rapid,The object was described as approximately 3-5 times the size of a car,It reflected light in a peculiar manner,The sighting was made by police officers on patrol who are considered reliable witnesses.
sighted object: an oblong shaped object with red and white lights
